author: DistroTube
description:
An employee at Canonical recently posted that they are planning to replace the GNU 'coreutils' with a Rust rewrite called 'uutils'. Why? Because Rust, that's why!

REFERENCED:
► https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/carefully-but-purposefully-oxidising-ubuntu/56995
► https://uutils.github.io/

title: Ubuntu Ditches GNU Core Utilities (Because...Rust?)
